dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Deathrite【Haste】​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
Base Stack: 3
When getting Rupture triggered by getting hit by an Attack Skill from a target with 10+ Speed, lose 1 Stack and gain +1 Rupture Count
At 0 Stack, take Gluttony damage equal to Rupture Potency on self; then, this effect expires
※ Cannot gain additional Stacks of this effect while it is already active
dataList.summary: If conditions are met: inflict Gluttony bonus damage

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Strider【Mao】​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
Max Stack: 3
Turn End: gain 5 Haste next turn
Reduced by 1 at Turn End
dataList.summary: If conditions are met: inflict Gluttony bonus damage

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Deception​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
- Low Morale
- If this unit's Speed is faster than the target or when using an Unopposed Attack, deal +10% more damage against the target

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Deception​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
- Panic
- If this unit's Speed is faster than the target or when using an Unopposed Attack, deal +20% more damage against the target; if this unit's Speed is faster than the target's, take -20% less damage

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>The Middle's Vendetta Mark​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
Max Stack: 10
When attacked by The Middle, take +3% more damage per Stack (max 30%)

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Persistence​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
Max Stack: 4
When taking lethal damage, 80% chance to not take that damage, heal 60 HP, recover from Stagger, and lose this effect

The above effects do not activate under the following conditions:
- When the Coin damage taken exceeds this unit's max HP
- When this unit has the HP Healing Down effect
Reduced by 1 at Turn End

dataList.desc: Turn Start: gain 1 Attack Power Up, 1 HP Healing Boost, and 1 Fragile
